lines.text: Yo, Weiner, you better get ready, 'cause at three o'clock today, I'm gonna RAPE you!
All of junior high school sucks. High school's better; it's closer to college. They'll call you names, but not as much to your face.
Dawn, you do not leave this table until you tell your sister that you love her!
Why do you hang out with that faggot?
Just because Ralphie's a faggot doesn't mean he's an asshole.
I don't mean to be a cunt.
[Dawn offers Steve something to eat while he waits for Mark to come home]
Ring Dings, Pop Tarts, whatever! I can make Jell-O.

[looking at beefcake photos of Steve]
Who took them?
Valerie Mondello. She's the photo editor of the yearbook.
For a few days. It was worth it, though, don't you think?
You think you're hot shit, but you're really just cold diarrhea.
Do you know what "special people" means?
Special people equals retarded. Your club is for retards.
Are you kidding? I want to get into a good school.
I don't want to go to Disney World.
Don't be stupid. If nothing else, it'll look good on your college résumé.

[walks up with cheerleaders]
Hi, Dawn, sorry to bother you, but we were just wondering... Are you a lesbian?
Liar. She made a pass at me.
[after seeing Dawn about to enter a school bathroom stall, then going over to the sink]
You didn't come in here to wash your hands.
You came in here to take a shit.
No, really. I don't have to go. My hands were just dirty, that's all.
Liar. I can smell you from here.

[Applause]
Thank you. I am here to talk to you today... about the dangers of talking to strangers. For I, Mary Ellen Moriarty, once talked to strangers. And that is how I became the innocent victim of a brutal kidnapping. Almost 1 year ago on that day... a day I will never forget... I was a carefree teenager memorizing my lines for Hello, Dolly, I was supposed to play Dolly. I was walking home from rehearsals, I'd missed my carpool. I was standing on the corner, waiting for the light to change... when all of a sudden... a dark car pulled up beside me. And a big man stepped out. And he was older... and good-looking... and, um... he had a tattoo on his chest. And then the next thing I know he, um... So, students, what im trying to say is...

[to Dawn]
Were you playing with my dolls?
Oh, Steve, they're all so beautiful.
I'm thinking of using this one on my first album cover.
Who told you to fight back?

[after Troy gets punched]
Troy, are you okay?

[after Brandon leaves Dawn's backyard]
Don't worry, Dawn. Brandon's just a retard.
Get off me! I'm the one that makes the first move.
Dawn? Do you think I'll get into the Hummingbirds next year?
Do you think they'll go on a trip to Disney World next year also?
What's the matter, faggot? In a hurry to run home to Mommy?
You think you're hot shit but you're really just cold diarrhea.
Man, if I were you, faggot, I'd be shittin' in my pants, 'cause when you go to junior high, man, I'm gonna smash that little fairy face of yours into a mushy pulp!
Yeah, well, at least he won't stay back a year!
[Brandon knocks her soda out of her hand and laughs]

[to Steve]
Want to see my fingers?
